overview: Based on an idea by a group of artists, technicians and film and stage crews, on June 24th, 2020, the event “A Shout for a New Renaissance” was staged at at Theater 8 of the Cinecittà Studios, calling on the art world to give more visibility to the problems of workers in the entertainment industry in the wake of the Covid-19 emergency.
title: Grido per un nuovo rinascimento
